name: node-sass-magic-importer
description: Custom node-sass importer for selector specific imports, node importing, module importing, globbing support and importing files only once
author: Markus Oberlehner

scripts.scripts:bundle: rm -R dist && rollup --config --format cjs --output dist/cli.js js/cli.js && rollup --config --format cjs --output dist/index.js js/index.js && rollup --config --format cjs --output dist/lib/default-options.js js/lib/default-options.js && rollup --config --format cjs --output dist/lib/magic-importer.js js/lib/magic-importer.js
scripts.scripts: npm run scripts:bundle && npm run scripts:lint-no-error
scripts.test:cli: npm run scripts:bundle && mocha test/cli.test.js --compilers js:babel-core/register
scripts.test: npm run scripts:bundle && mocha test/* --compilers js:babel-core/register
